medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient demonstrated a gradual worsening of symptoms, with encephalopathy and progression to fulminant hepatic failure occurring during the first week after admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Deep venous thrombosis of both lower extremities 2 years previously; mutations (C677T and A1298C) in the gene for methylenetetrahydrofolate reductase (MTHFR).
medical_history.family_history: Positive for thrombo-philic states; the patient's mother had thrombosis of the central retinal vein.
